thread.title: Nicole Bass reveals what happened after 'cheating' former flame Jacques Fraser washed up on Ex On The Beach
thread.title_full: Nicole Bass reveals what happened after 'cheating' former flame Jacques Fraser washed up on Ex On The Beach

author: Vicki Newman
title: Nicole Bass reveals what happened after 'cheating' former flame Jacques Fraser washed up on Ex On The Beach
text:
Nicole Bass reveals what happened after 'cheating' former flame Jacques Fraser washed up on Ex On The Beach Jack has travelled to the beach to win Nicole back Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jacques reveals he's arrived to get his ex Nicole back Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Nicole Bass is in for a surprise when her ex Jacques Fraser washes up on the beach in a bid to win her back. 
The former TOWIE babe will be greeted by her former flame - who describes her as 'the one that got away' - on this week's Ex On The Beach . 
The 25-year-old beauty, from Essex, finds herself in a difficult position when Jacques - whose full name is Jacques René Fraser (despite none of his family members being French) but is better known as Jack Fraser- joins her on the MTV show . 
He's there to win back her affections, but Nicole has already been told by another ex, Adam, that Jacques cheated on her during their relationship, leaving her in tears. Read More Will Nicole take Jacques back? (Photo: ITV) She was told by another ex that he cheated on her (Photo: Instagram) 
Nicole spoke to Mirror Celeb ahead of Tuesday night's show about confronting Jacques and what happened when the cameras stopped rolling. 
She said: "It was a hard one with Jacques because I was only with him for a couple of months but he's the only boy I've been with that I've had a strong connection with. I did really love him but he did mess up a lot in the first two months." 
Viewers will see Nicole confront Jacques about what she's been told, and him deny that anything happened. 
"I was confident at the time that he didn't cheat on me," she revealed. 
When asked whether or not she'd since found out for sure if he'd cheated, Nicole said she couldn't say. Things are back on track for the couple (Photo: Instagram) 
But whatever happened, Nicole and Jacques are now back together and happier than ever. 
"I'm really happy with him now - he's changed a lot," she said. 
"I've always said that a leopard never changes his spots but this one seems to have done it." 
The pair have now been dating for 11 months. 
Nicole has previously been linked to Ex On The Beach co-star Aaron Chalmers and TOWIE's Lewis Bloor , but quashed both relationships. 
She said that her and Aaron had never been together and have more of a "best mates" relationship, and that while she went on a few dates with Lewis, she wouldn't say they were in a "relationship". 
Nicole has been watching the show each week. 
She said: "There are certain things that you see on the show and you think, 'I can't remember that', but the cameras are with you 24 hours a day. 
"You do forget about some things you say but it's the same for everybody. Taking part in the show was a great experience, a lot of fun, and it taught me a lot about myself as a person." Read More They're so in love (Photo: Instagram) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
